text: KSOR (90.1 FM) is a National Public Radio member station licensed to Ashland, Oregon. The station is owned by Southern Oregon University, and is an affiliate of Jefferson Public Radio. It is the flagship of JPR's "Classics & News" service, consisting of news and classical music programming. KSOR was the original station in what would become JPR, signing on in 1969. ==External links== *ijpr.org * SOR Category:Classical music radio stations in the United States Category:NPR member stations Category:Southern Oregon University Category:1969 establishments in Oregon
title: KSOR
